question: 何遍
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>What</kanji>'s <kanji>universal</kanji>? <vocabulary>How many times</vocabulary> do you think that question's been asked throughout time? Probably a lot of times.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just watch out because <ja>へん</ja> becomes <ja>べん</ja> here.
